description: tao httt card payoo fee the va day ve bang push
body:
INSERT INTO dbo.POSPaymentMethod
    (
		BillID
		,Status
       , CreatedDate
       , CreatedBy
       , Remark
	   , CashAmount
       , TransferAmount
	   ,CreditCardType
	   ,CardPaymentMethod
	   ,CardAmount
	   ,VoucherAmount
	   ,CreditCardNumber
       , PaymentType
	   ,U_CTLKCode
	   , Card_Fee
	   , CardFeeTM	  
    )
SELECT 
	s.ID
	,1
	,  S.CreatedDateTime
	, s.CreatedBy
	, N'Thanh Toán Bằng Thẻ'
	, 0
	, 0
	, '1'
	,7
	, ISNULL(S.TotalAmount, 0)
	, 0
	,'3555'
	,'CARD'
	,'BIDV'
	, ISNULL(S.TotalAmount*1/100,0)
	, 0
FROM 
	dbo.PaymentBillReceipts S (NOLOCK) 
WHERE 
	S.Id IN (
	$CURSOR$
)
INSERT INTO dbo.CRM_POS_COLLECTION_ON_BEHALF_PUSH
    (
         CRMID
       , CRMCode
       , VendorCode
       , TotalAmount
       , Fee
       , CreateDate
       , U_ShpCod
       , U_CrdCod
       , U_EplCod
       , U_Desc
       , U_MoCash
       , U_MoCCad
       , U_Acbank
       , U_CTLKCode
       , U_TypCre
       , U_NumCre
       , U_MoVoCh
       , U_NumVch
       , U_NaVoch
       , U_AcVoch
       , U_MoTran
       , U_BankTs
       , U_AccNum
       , U_AccName
       , IsAutoCard
       , Card_Fee
       , CardFeeTM
       , LongChauShopCode
       , UpdatedDate
       , PushStatus
       , POSMsg
       , POSORCT
       , MaChuanChi
       , SplitFee
       , SplitFeeType
       , mPOSDocNum
       , Status
    )
SELECT
      B.ID
	, B.BillCode
	, B.VendorCode
	, B.TotalAmount
	, B.PaymentFee
	, B.CreatedDateTime
	, B.WarehouseCode
	, 0
	, B.CreatedEmployeeBy
	, ''
	, P.CashAmount
	, P.CardAmount
	, P.CardPaymentMethod
	, P.U_CTLKCode
	, P.CreditCardType
	, P.CreditCardNumber
	, P.VoucherAmount
	, P.VoucherNumber
	, P.VoucherName
	, P.VoucherAccount
	, P.TransferAmount
	, P.BankCode
	, P.BankAccountNumber
	, P.BankAccountName
	, CASE WHEN P.IsAutoCard = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
	, P.Card_Fee
	, P.CardFeeTM
	, ''
	, NULL
	, 1
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, P.CreditCardNumber
	, 0
	, 0
	, NULL
	, B.PaymentBillStatus 
FROM
    dbo.PaymentBillReceipts B (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.POSPaymentMethod P (NOLOCK)
				ON B.ID = P.BillID
		
WHERE
    B.ID IN (
	$CURSOR$
);
